start.description: You are in a hallway that runs east-west.  To the west, at the end of the hallway you see a treasure chest held closed by a comically large padlock.  To the east, you can see a sign at the end of the hallway that reads "KEY HERE".

eastend.description: You reach the east end of the hallway and find a table with a key sitting on top.  You take the key.  The only way to go is west, back to the place where you started.

westend.description: You go to the treasure chest, use the key to open its padlock, and lift the lid.  Inside is a thick leather-bound book titled "A pictorial tour of the Unicode standard". It has been your dream to own this book ever since lecture 7 of MCS 260.  You take the book and smile with satisfaction.
